name: BabyDragon
0:
”Alexa, ask Baby Dragon to tell me a story”
”Alexa, ask Baby Dragon to read me a story”
”Alexa, open Baby Dragon and read me a story”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baby dragon
des: Alexa will tell fun fictional stories appropriate for young children. Some stories may encourage interactive listener participation.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
